about_the_game:
Summary

Rogue North is a punishing survival shooter where every fight makes your heart pound. Manage your limited resources and tactically take down the enemy as you make your way though an unpredictable Canadian war zone.

Features

  • A challenging campaign that takes you across a crumbling Canada.
  • Inventory management: Should I take the bullets or the health pack?
  • An impactive health system: Bullet wounds can cause bleeds and bone fractures, which will affect your ability to fight.
  • Dynamic, reactive enemies with varying skill levels and tactics to keep you on your toes.
  • A living world. The Mercenaries, Canadian army, and Rogues all play a part in this beautifully frigid rendition of Canada.
  • Violent snow storms can creep up at any time. You won't be the only one seeking warmth.

content_descriptors.notes: A large amount of cartoon violence.

detailed_description:
Update Notes

IMPORTANT:

As of August 15th 2023, Rogue North's development has CEASED INDEFINITELY. Read about it here: . However, this page will remain up in case development starts again in the far future.

name: Rogue North

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows xp +
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 500MB
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A heart pounding survival shooter that makes you fear every gunshot. Fight through a Canadian war zone during an endless winter. Meet people, manage your resources, and tactically make your escape. Can you survive the winter?
